sentence.Network_en: The doctors'sense was that the girls fared well, but it remained to be determined whether they suffered any brain damage, said Dr. John Frazee, another neurosurgeon.
sentence.Network_cn: 而另一位神经外科医生约翰·弗雷齐博士却认为, 虽然目前这对姐妹的情况很好, 但还不能确保她们的脑部没有受到损伤.
